segments.text: How is the result of your lab test ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When it comes to that , I have a lot to say .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I went back to my doctor to hear the results of my lab tests , I tried to keep a poker face even though I was scared to death . Then you guess what he said .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That â€™ s just what I want to know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He told me the tests were negative and there was nothing wrong with me .
segments.speaker: S2
